name: @tgnd/ai
description: TGND AI layer: rule-based routing (zip, radius, skills), scheduling, anomaly, extraction

scripts.test: node -e "const R=require('./src/routing'); const wo={id:'w1', ship_to:{zip:'95834'}, service_type:'osr', required_skills:['tv_repair']}; const techs=[{id:'t1', zip:'95834', skills:['tv_repair']},{id:'t2', zip:'95814', skills:['tv_repair']}]; console.log(R.recommendTopN(wo, techs, { topN: 2 }));"

author: TGND
